annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 6(a) of Metropolitan Police Housing Assistance Program and Community Safety Temporary Act of 1993 (D.C. Law 10-63, October 8, 1993, law notification 40 DCR ]).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 12-59, title XI, § 1101 ( 44 DCR 7356), eff. March 20, 1998, provided for the temporary repeal of §§ 45-2221 to 45-2226 [1981 Ed.]. Section 2001(b) of D.C. Law 12-59 provided for expiration “after 225 days of its having taken effect.”
